snippet: Factory farms are an ecological disaster, but small local organic farms aren’t the solution.
abstract: Op-Ed article by author James E McWilliams asserts that alternatives to factory farming of animals are not good for the environment, despite having the appearance of being environmentally sustainable; contends that the only sustainable solution is to stop growing animals for their meat.
lead_paragraph: Factory farms are an ecological disaster, but small local organic farms aren’t the solution.
